name: Suspicious Lasagna
desc: A baked pasta dish. The pasta and fillings are haphazardly mixed together, and the texture leaves a lot to be desired. You can almost feel the Lasagna becoming lodged in your throat — but don't worry, this isn't the worst part. You still have the next bite, which will be even harder to swallow.

value.text: Restores 30% of Max HP and an additional 600 HP to the selected character.

customize.name: Recipe: Lasagna
customize.desc: A detailed step-by-step recipe for making Lasagna.

customize.name: Flour
customize.desc: A powder ground from wheat. No matter what it goes into, it brings a sense of satisfaction to the diner.

customize.name: Raw Meat
customize.desc: A fresh chunk of meat. Handled properly, it can be used to make delicious food.

customize.name: Cheese
customize.desc: Made from fermented milk. High in energy, it's used in a wide range of dishes.

customize.name: Butter
customize.desc: An extract from milk. With the appropriate application, it can bring rich aromas to even the most basic ingredients.

customize.name: Lasagna
customize.desc: A baked pasta dish. Spread cheese, meat sauce, and Béchamel sauce on a layer of pasta strips, and place another layer of pasta strips on the top - repeat the process a few times and bake the pasta until the cheese becomes golden and bubbly. The secret of its tastiness lies in the carefully-prepared meat sauce.

customize.name: Delicious Lasagna
customize.desc: A baked pasta dish. The song of Pots and Fire eulogizes the meat sauce's ascension to he Pasta Throne. The moment it enters your mouth, it graces you with bliss so unparalleled that you almost want to make today Lasagna Day!
